static_contents.Footer Links:
About Us

Agel Langgeng was established in Bekasi in 1991. Our first product, Relaxa Candy, was launched in 1993. Not only did Relaxa become the first fragrant candy introduced to the market, but Agel also birthed an entirely new category and continues to be the market leader ever since.
static_contents.Footer Links 2:
Contact

The Plaza Office Tower Lt 22 Unit A-D
Jl. MH. Thamrin Kav. 28-30
Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia
Phone: 021-0000001
E-mail: info@agel.co.id
